title: Saudi Arabia's Future City Neom Will Invest $50 Million in Metaverse Giant Animoca
description: Neom, a $500 billion future city project, has aligned with metaverse firm Animoca Brands to consult on blockchain use cases.

title: Bitcoin miners navigate increasing difficulty for higher rewards
description:

title: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032: ARB breaks key barrier

title: Hong Kong Monetary Authority concludes first CBDC trial
description: The initial phase of Hong Kong's central bank digital currency (CBDC) pilot has concluded, showcasing potential advancements in digital finance, though leaving uncertainties regarding its full implementation and technological direction.
